4.12 The OLE-AUTOMATION module

with-OLE

Macro

Summary

A convenience macro that calls OLE-initialize, executes some body forms, and calls OLE-uninitialize in a cleanup clause.

Macro call

with-OLE body end

Arguments

body
A Dylan bodybnf.

Values

None.

Description

A convenience macro that calls OLE-initialize, executes the body forms, and calls OLE-uninitialize in a cleanup clause.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
